name: Atom Space
description:
[Here is a remake of a Game I made in Unity. This time I used Godot.

Unity Version : https://anderooo.itch.io/atom-space]

Game Rules :

The Atom [ ] will follow the mouse cursor [  ].

Protons [   ] Increase the Size of the Atom.

Electrons [  ] Decrease the Size of the Atom.

Neutrons [ ] turn into either a Proton or an Electron when they come in contact with them.

Clear [  ] Clears all the Particles (Protons, Electrons and Neutrons) in the Atom.

The Atom has to collect Protons and Electrons (by making the Atom come in Contact with them) to increase the score.

The Atom Size cannot go above 20 or below -20 or else the Game will be Over.

If the Number of Particles (Protons, Electrons and Neutrons) in the Atom is More than 20 the Game will be Over
